General.Name: Omnijoi Media Corp
General.Description: Omnijoi Media Corporation operates in the television and movie industry. The company produces and distributes drama series and movies. It also operates and franchises cineplexes with screens. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Nanjing, China.

1.Name: Mr. Ye Jun  Lai
1.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. and Sec. of Board of Directors
